author: barnabasbusa
content: Looks like it still requires the EIP4844_FORK_EPOCH field to run it <@554799849288105986>

author: barnabasbusa
content: Ok, I have set the EIP4844 epoch to something far out in the future, so it wouldn't complain anymore

author: barnabasbusa
content: And now it looks like lh can go up to the point of capella, but not after that. Head seems to be stuck at slot 31 (which is just one slot away from capella fork)

author: sproul
content:
I was doing some testing today as well but I didn't see this error. I did find a a bug in the main eip4844 branch that breaks BlocksByRoot requests though, waiting on this PR to merge to fix it: <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/3743>

My testnet set up is here: <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/3742>

Still working through some issues with the merge transition, but they may not be relevant for your testnet starting with a merged state from genesis
